name: Spin-Out
overview:
Spin-Out is a simplistic dual arrow/wheel spinning redemption game with a drag race theme by Coastal Amusements

After you insert your credits, the two arrows on the wheel begin to spin. All you have to do is push the STOP button to make them stop on the best ticket and multiplier values listed on the wheel. Upon the first press, the large blue arrow will stop on one of the listed ticket values; upon the second press, it will stop on a multiplier (between 1-3). With the right combination, players can win jackpots as high as 1000 tickets! Between that and the impressive size of the game, this is certain to be a top attraction in any arcade.
